entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 09:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon except rain along the coast late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
